While the art is great, I just really don't like this kind of NTR. And from what I know, it encompasses most under this tag. Now don't get me wrong, I know there's different versions of NTR, and I can honestly enjoy some of them despite preferring vanilla, this is the kind I hate. I don't even bother with the WAY overly cliche storyline, nor the guy loosing the girl. I'm just annoyed beyond hell that it's too over used, like a gangbang NTR chick. (On purpose joke) That's my only complaint, NTR enthusiasts can enjoy their NTR without me wailing on them, it's their choice. I only want to voice my displeasure on the part where everyone else has stated that it has been overdone. 

Side note: Main reason I haven't black listed NTR is for the ones where the guy NTRs the girl from an asshole/unaprieciatve man, otherwise      I simply leave them alone. I have seen a few that get a few laughs out of me, though.
